settings.editor: Analytics is a self-service BI and data analytics software that lets you create visually appealing data visualizations and insightful dashboards in minutes.

settings.invalid_message: There's something wrong. The form is invalid.

settings.title: Discover hidden insights from your raw data

settings.editor: Transform huge amounts of raw data into actionable reports and dashboards. Track your key business metrics, see longtime trends, identify outliers, and unearth hidden insights.
Wherever your data is, you can now use Analytics for in depth reporting and analysis. Data sync is automatic and can be scheduled periodically.
Visually analyze your data and build insightful reports and dashboards with our easy drag-and-drop interface. No IT help required!
Carry out in-depth analytics, derive key metrics, and uncover hidden insights using the powerful analytical capabilities.
Develop reports together with your colleagues. Share with each other, for informed business decision making.

You can upload data from spreadsheets & flat files like Microsoft Excel, CSV, HTML, JSON, XML, text files and more. You can also feed data from online storage services like Analytics Docs, Google Drive, Box, Dropbox & Microsoft OneDrive. Data can also be pulled from Web URL feeds.

settings.editor: Make use of a variety of charts, widgets, pivot tables and tabular view components to create insightful reports and dashboards. More new types are frequently getting added too.

settings.editor: Data visualization is going to change the way our analysts work with data. They’re going to be expected to respond to issues more rapidly. And they’ll need to be able to dig for more insights – look at data differently, more imaginatively. Data visualization will promote that creative data exploration.
Have a question? Reach out through one of the options below and someone from the Analytics team will be in touch soon.
Address: 111 Toblerone Street, London, UK, ED3A 6AF
